name: Behind Doors
description:
Short puzzle game with keys, doors and barriers made in Unreal Engine 4 for the  The Perfect Server First Official Game Jam .

The theme is "KEYS ARE LIMITED" so I made most levels never have the exact number of keys needed to finish it so you always need to move them from door to door 

The game has no menu, everything is "physical" in game, For example, instead of a quit button you have an exit door. 

My development diary for the jam: 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ymrmeZ1bIcFGjluRZMuUW1cGNSyxGYw5yX9yn-Swci8/...
